official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act for the purpose of providing medicare payments for ambulance service to a physician's office if such office is the nearest facility equipped to handle the emergency.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to expand the coverage of that Title to include ambulance service to a physician's office if such office is the nearest facility equipped to handle the emergency.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act for the purpose of providing medicare payments for ambulance service to a physician's office if such office is the nearest facility equipped to handle the emergency.
